original_text: Nobody will ever shut the city's gates at the end of the day. It will always be day and there will be no night there.
korean_text: 낮에 성문들을 도무지 닫지 아니하리니 거기에는 밤이 없음이라

sentences.original_text: Nobody will ever shut the city's gates
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그 도시의 문을 닫지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: at the end of the day
and there will be no night there
